column6:
2006 home; appliances less than 2 yrs old, laminate floors (wood pattern), new furniture. Less than 5 mins to TX-288 and Beltway 8

Non-rush hour commute times:
15 mins to Med Ctr
15 mins to stadium
20 mins to center of downtown Houston

This is a traditional rental. Utilities and lawn upkeep is included. I also provide a contact for any maintenance issues.
